comments:
Happens when trying to open linked issue from description in bug 163735 (one below fail too):

Is this not a bug in the web connector?

Created an attachment (id=53430)
Added more null checks

Mik, you are right. It is a bug in a WebConnector, when repository configuration is screwed.
